Barrel - Class in GameP.bossObjects
The barrel of the game.
Barrel(World, Hero, Boss) - Constructor for class GameP.bossObjects.Barrel
initializes and creates a barrel from a shape and adds an image.
Barrel(World, Hero, AngryBoss) - Constructor for class GameP.bossObjects.Barrel
initializes and creates a barrel from a shape and adds an image.
beginContact(SensorEvent) - Method in class GameP.gameListeners.ObjectLauncher
Override, launches a fire or barrel object(at random) or launches bullets depending on the level.

The main Boss of the game, extends static body .
Boss(World, GameMain, Hero) - Constructor for class GameP.characters.Boss
initializes and creates the boss from a shape and adds an image.

A State of the mini boss.
BossAttackState() - Constructor for class GameP.characters.bossStates.BossAttackState
 
BossDefeated() - Method in class GameP.characters.AngryBoss
spawns a portal then attaches a listener to it when this boss is defeated .
BossDefeated() - Method in class GameP.characters.Boss
When the boss gets defeated create a star that provides the entrance to the next level .
BossEnragedState - Class in GameP.characters.bossStates
A State of the mini boss.
BossEnragedState() - Constructor for class GameP.characters.bossStates.BossEnragedState
 
bossHit() - Method in class GameP.characters.AngryBoss
reduces lives and updates fsm when boss is hit .
